project.name: The Brain
project.purpose: Flask-based control center that powers Build, Fix, and Know flows alongside an office manager demo dataset.
project.notes: Machine Room provides a supervisory view into database health and recent activity.

primary_user_flows: Build: plan and generate implementation tasks through the Build orchestrator
Fix: review and apply automated fixes via the Fix service
Know: answer operational questions using the Knowledge service
Office manager views: roster, schedule, and maintenance dashboards
Machine Room: supervisor overview of database metrics and audit history

backend.database: SQLAlchemy with SQLite or PostgreSQL via DATABASE_URL
services: ImportService for CSV and JSON uploads

operations.environment: Configured via .env; compatible with Render/Heroku style deployments

completed_or_legacy: Build/Fix/Know flows wired to orchestrator, fixer, and knowledge services
Machine Room reporting for employees, flights, maintenance, and audit logs
CSV/JSON import pipeline for roster and flight data
planned_next: Extend knowledge ingestion and embedding refresh cadence
Surface project summary in Machine Room for supervisory audit (this task)
